item.title: Foreman openidc SSO with keycloak
item.description: I this post I will show you how you can configure Foreman to use Keycloak asz an OIDC SSO authentication provider.

item.title: Install Foreman PXE boot
item.description: Foreman is a complete lifecycle management tool for physical and virtual servers. We give system administrators the power to easily automate repetitive tasks, quickly deploy applications, and proactively manage servers, on-premise or in the cloud.
